title: Building My Portfolio
author: Pranay Chowdhury
content: In this post, I’ll discuss the journey of building my personal portfolio. It’s a place where I can showcase my projects, blogs, and thoughts as a web developer. I’ve used React to build the frontend, and it's hosted on Vercel.

title: Why I Love React
author: Pranay Chowdhury
content: React has completely changed the way I build web applications. In this post, I’ll dive deep into why I love using React and its component-based structure that makes it so powerful for building dynamic user interfaces.

title: Exploring Firebase Authentication
author: Pranay Chowdhury
content: Firebase Authentication simplifies the process of adding authentication to your app. In this blog post, I explore the Firebase Authentication API, the benefits of using it, and how to set it up in a React app.
